review: Love it!  Great value and works as advertised.  Would recommend to friends.

review: Love it qnd my kid loves the games
author: James

review: More responsive and better quality picture than the Netflix app on the XBOX.
author: James K. Donegan

review: This is way better than the google chrome stick. Almost no buffering. Love it.
author: vivek b.

review: Amazing product!  We replaced most of our older TV'S with new flat smart TV'S.  Almost all except for one because we just bought a flat HD tv just last year. Well, the fire stick actually makes the regular HD better than the smart TVs.  It's even faster at loading than the smart TVs.  Love it!  Oh and the TV remote works with it as well.  One remote for everything!  Amazing!
author: Donna Alexander

review: Amazing! Catching up on past shows.
author: Greg T Payne

review: This was such an awesome purchase. I love it. Picture and sound are awesome
author: Robert M. Busonick

review: Love it.  Very easy to use
author: Rhoda Massaro
